title: Upgrade your account to lifetime membership?

noDL.title: Via raw Beet deeplink
noDL.step1: Launch the BEET wallet and navigate to 'Raw Link' in the menu.
noDL.step2: From this page you can either allow all operations, or solely allow operation 8 'account_upgrade' (then click save).
noDL.step3: Once 'Ready for raw links' shows in Beet submit this request.
noDL.label: Enter your account ID

DL.title: Raw deeplink generated
DL.step1: Your BEET deeplink has been generated, click the button to proceed.
DL.step2: A BEET prompt will display, verify the contents then approve the account upgrade prompt.
DL.step3: Once approved, your account will be permanently upgraded, enjoy!

header: Interested in upgrading your account to lifetime-membership status?
secondHeader: Reduces fees, enables the referral mechanism and qualifies you for lifetime membership targetted airdrops.
